wikipedia_page.main: Frank Nuttall (born 4 May 1968 in Hamilton) is a Scottish professional football manager for Saint George.

response: In October 2020, German coach Ernst Middendorp joined the club after exiting Kaizer Chiefs F.C., signing a 3 year contract. In November 2020, Middendorp resigned from his position due to concerns of political unrest in Ethiopia, he was replaced by his assistant coach Maahier Davids. After only 15 matches in charge, Davids was sacked as head coach of the club in March of 2021. Scotsman Frank Nuttall was hired to replace him and guided the team to a disappointing third place finish in the league. In July of 2021, the club hired Serbian Zlatko Krmpotić as its new head coach.

The club won the Kenya National Football league in 1968, having been formally founded only in February of the same year. In 1976, Gor Mahia won the national league unbeaten, and repeated the same feat 39 years later under the leadership of Frank Nuttall.
Gor Mahia players further added to the club's mystique by finishing their Sportspesa Premier League fixtures for 2015 season unbeaten, under Head Coach Frank Nuttall
Bobby Williamson's managerial debut came in a league match against Sugar FC on 17 July 2013. He left the club in September 2014, being replaced by Frank Nuttall, whom he recommended to the club.
